result.reason: The current deserializer logic strictly allows only specific RDCMan versions (e.g., 2.7), causing imports from newer compatible versions (like 2.92) to fail with a file format exception.
result.approach: Relax the VerifyFileVersion check in RemoteDesktopConnectionManagerDeserializer.cs to accept any programVersion >= 2.7 while maintaining schema version validation.
